price: Enti monye Nyankopͻn ne Ne somafoͻ no, ne Nhyerεnee a Yɛasiane aba no ni. Onyankopͻn ne dwuma a modie no nyinaa ho amane bͻ Wura.
arabic: فَـَٔامِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَٱلنُّورِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنزَلۡنَاۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: faāminū bil-lahi warasūlihi wal-nūri alladhī anzalnā wal-lahu bimā taʿmalūna khabīrun
